notes:
Mini-boss to the [[Undead Dragon]].
Dont stay in front of him or he can spam you with the waves and make combos over 2000.
name: Bones
location: It used to be a raid probably manipulated by the [[Ruthless Seven]] in the north of the Darashia depot. It's been removed as of 30.01.2007
strategy: Paladins should stay diagonal of the creature and spam SD's and be quick on the healing.
